entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a wizard who is staring at Harry and talking about Muggles being held by some people at the campsite.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is frowning and making a comment about Bagman's behavior.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who is leading the way off the path into a small clearing and sitting down on dry grass.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a wizard who is being referred to as a great Beater and whose model figure is being watched by Ron.

entities.name: wimbourne wasps
entities.description: The Wimbourne Wasps are a Quidditch team that won the league three times in a row while Bagman was with them.

relationships.description: Bagman is talking about some people having got hold of a family of Muggles at the campsite.
Hermione makes a comment about Bagman's behavior, saying he is not exactly on top of things.
Ron is watching the model figure of Krum and admiring him as a great Beater.
Bagman was with the Wimbourne Wasps Quidditch team.
